name: VersionJSONFile
description: Applies a version to a named field in a JSON File
author: Black Marble

inputs.name: Path
inputs.label: Source folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Source folder for assemblies files, can be root as it will find all files recursively

inputs.name: VersionNumber
inputs.label: Version Number
inputs.helpMarkDown: Version number to apply to files, can be extraced from the build name 'Build HelloWorld_00.00.00000.0' format

inputs.name: useBuildNumberDirectly
inputs.label: Use Version Number without processing
inputs.helpMarkDown: Use the version number parameter without any further processing

inputs.name: VersionRegex
inputs.label: Regex Filter to extract build number
inputs.helpMarkDown: Regular expression filter to get build number from the build name.

inputs.name: versionForJSONFileFormat
inputs.label: Version Format for JSON File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Format of version number to apply as Version in the JSON File.

inputs.name: Field
inputs.label: The version field to update
inputs.helpMarkDown: The version field to update, if blank all version fields are updated usually "version": "1.1.1"

inputs.name: OutputVersion
inputs.label: Version number used variable name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The actual version number extracted and used from the build number.
